column5: Extremely private 4300' view home up in the tree-tops near Westlake, which is a high-end and close-in area of Austin, four miles and fifteen minutes west of downtown. It sits up near the top of the highest hill around, and has an incredible view of the south Austin hills, (20 miles or more on a clear day) from the kitchen, living area, and 70-foot long, tree-top deck with outdoor living area and four burner webber gas grill. Extensive children's play equipment in the large backyard.
